response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential for those who understand its true worth. I am offering this exceptional piece at a special introductory price of $850,000. This is a limited-time offer designed to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for quality.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or would like to discuss the product further, I am more than happy to provide additional information. I believe this investment could greatly benefit you and potentially increase in value over time.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
